definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="food">food</variable><variable type="MCItem" id="toadd">toadd</variable><variable type="String" id="localart">localart</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="2"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_data_integer_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">quest</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="5"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_data_integer_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">step</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> Oh, hi! Sorry for not talking with you before, the things haven't been that easy these days.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_data_integer_set"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">step</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_data_integer_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">step</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> Do you need something? I'm a little bit occupied.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_data_integer_set"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">step</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_data_integer_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">step</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> You seem to be on your free time now. Some stray dogs that I've been helping these days costed a lot of the food on the fridge.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_data_integer_set"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field type="entity_data_integer_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:KaleTheCaretaker</field><field name="accessor">step</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO3"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> I don't care too much about giving our food to them, but the others don't seem to be appreciate that, so, Li said is ok to give them some of our food, as long as no one here starve.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> The problem is, some accident happened on the truck that bring our red meat, so... someone must go out there and Thank you, you're a kind soul.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="4"></mutation><field name="procedure">KaleTheCaretakerTaskManagement</field><field name="name0">pc</field><field name="name1">parsedalignment</field><field name="name2">step</field><field name="name3">quest</field><value name="arg0"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-0.0002</field></block></value><value name="arg1"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="arg2"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="arg3"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> I'm already three minutes late to mine fifteen minute long sleep. As you must expect, I'm in a hurry now again, can you lend me a hand?</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Kale> We have some rain collectors at the gardens, but that water is not suitable for drinking, as it takes a lot of time to collect and some filth might stack up on the collectors, so, my plan is to build a filter, can you provide me the materials?</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_data_integer_set"><field
